title: Time for ecofriendly and sustainable agriculture

tasks.task: Discuss the relevance of organic food and farming practices.
subtasks: Explain the current agricultural system's unsustainable aspects.
Highlight environmental and health concerns related to chemicals in farming.
Contrast traditional and modern farming methods.
Address economic and social aspects of organic food.
Assess the impact of agricultural subsidies on food production.
Evaluate the nutritional value and safety of organic versus conventional food.
Reflect on the interconnectedness of agriculture, health, and the environment.
